document_data.mainbody:
Highsun Liqueur was a druidic alcoholic drink found in the Western Heartlands, the lands along the River Chionthar, and the city of Baldurs Gate, as of the late 15 century DR.
Highsun Liqueur was brewed using various herbs picked during summer solstice â€“ Kythorn 20. Druids believed that this liquor cleansed the imbibers spirit from the previous seasons sins and sickness and was said to aid digestion.
